Package org.tinyradius.server

Class HandlerAdapter<T extends RadiusPacket>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.SimpleChannelInboundHandler<io.netty.channel.socket.DatagramPacket>
          • org.tinyradius.server.HandlerAdapter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - RadiusPacket types that this Channel can accept

    public class HandlerAdapter<T extends RadiusPacket>
extends io.netty.channel.SimpleChannelInboundHandler<io.netty.channel.socket.DatagramPacket>
    SimpleChannelInboundHandler implementation that converts between RadiusPackets and DatagramPackets. Acts as an adapter so RequestHandlers dont have to be concerned with DatagramPacket, and can work with RadiusPacket directly.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler

    • Constructor Detail

      • HandlerAdapter

        public HandlerAdapter​(PacketEncoder packetEncoder,
                      RequestHandler<T> requestHandler,
                      io.netty.util.Timer timer,
                      SecretProvider secretProvider,
                      java.lang.Class<T> packetClass)
        Parameters:
        packetEncoder - for encoding/decoding RadiusPackets
        requestHandler - handle requests
        timer - handle timeouts if requests take too long to be processed
        secretProvider - lookup sharedSecret given remote address
        packetClass - restrict RadiusPacket subtypes that can be processed by handler, otherwise will be dropped. If all types of RadiusPackets are allowed, use RadiusPacket

      • handleRequest

        protected io.netty.util.concurrent.Future<io.netty.channel.socket.DatagramPacket> handleRequest​(io.netty.channel.Channel channel,
                                                                                                io.netty.channel.socket.DatagramPacket datagramPacket)
                                                                                         throws RadiusException
        Processes DatagramPacket. This does not swallow exceptions.
        Parameters:
        channel - socket on which request was received
        datagramPacket - datagram received
        Returns:
        Future that completes when request is handled. Can contain DatagramPacket response
        Throws:
        RadiusException - malformed packet
